alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 2:52PM CDT until May 05 at 11:37PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint Creek near Kansas. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from Fidlers Bend to Chewey Bridge. Permanent campgrounds and farmlands are affected. Turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 12.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
